function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of parking around job sites in urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to employees parking far from the site and carpooling","Mitigation":"Provide alternative transportation methods that comply with social-distancing orders","Technologies":"Smart parking solutions, shuttle buses with social-distancing measures","People":"Construction workers, employees","Owner":"Construction company, local government"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on demand for project types","Impact":"Decrease in demand for hospitality, retail, and entertainment projects, increase in demand for health care and health care-related projects","Mitigation":"Diversify project portfolio, focus on health care and health care-related projects","Technologies":"Market research and analysis, project management tools","People":"Construction companies, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project management teams"},{"Description":"Increase in demand for healthcare facilities due to pandemic","Impact":"Decrease in revenue for health-care facilities, increased need for healthcare facilities to accommodate infected and sick people","Mitigation":"Increase health-care capacities, expand healthcare facility construction","Technologies":"Healthcare facility planning software, construction management software","People":"Healthcare facility owners, government authorities","Owner":"Healthcare facility owners, government authorities"}]}
